abstract: While switching Web addresses from MSNBC.com to NBCNews.com was easy, it will take months for Microsoft and NBC to fully dissolve the deal that formed MSNBC.com as a 50-50 joint venture in the mid-1990s.
snippet: While switching Web addresses from MSNBC.com to NBCNews.com was easy, it will take months for Microsoft and NBC to fully dissolve the deal that formed MSNBC.com as a 50-50 joint venture in the mid-1990s.
lead_paragraph: For Web users, the transition from MSNBC.com to NBCNews.com is an easy one. The old domain name automatically started to redirect to the new one on Sunday night.

headline.main: Months of Transition Ahead for NBC News Online
